About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 8:30am-3:30pm by appointment; closed Thursday 12:30pm onwards. General reference assistance available. No copying services available.

About.Access: At least one day's advance notice of visit required. Permission of Principal must be gained for access to records.

About.Acquisition focus: The Archives keeps school records, photos of special occasions, any special items belonging to people who have become famous. (90% in-house).

About.Major holdings: Kogarah Marist High: Weekly newsletters, function programs, function photos, newspaper items on school activities.
